column3: Tourism;Siem Reap:------ A young man died at 1:20 pm on April 16
column8: Siem Reap province.------ According to police
column9: a youth aged around 14 from Kampong Thom province who was visiting Kulen Falls with family
column10: jumped into the water and apparently hit his head against the rocks. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/431671
